item.title: Part1
item.description: TL/DR This guide documents a simple Prometheus PushGateway setup on top of Civo's k3s offering. We will then push some data to the gateway and visualize it in Grafana. The end result for this project is an environmental monitoring system that gathers sensor data. I won't actually deploy the scrape jobs in this guide, but we will send a metric with curl and visualize it in each of the core components.
